item.title: 为什么我们现在生活在休闲食品的黄金时代？
item.description:
丰富多彩背后的技术突破。【原文：

The technological breakthroughs behind the variety and abundance.

】

item.title: 太古希望在中国和东南亚投资更多医院
item.description: 几十年来，太古股份有限公司一直在中国经营香港的大型航空公司和焦炭装瓶厂，如今，该公司正向新的业务领域多元化发展：在中国和东南亚经营私立医院。【原文：After decades of operating Hong Kong’s marquee airline and coke bottling factories in China, Swire Pacific Ltd. is diversifying into a new line of business: private hospitals in China and Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯正与华尔街顶级银行商谈阿美石油公司股票出售事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正在与华尔街顶级银行就石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）的二次股票出售进行谈判，因为该公司正在推进近年来规模最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Saudi Arabia is in talks to add top Wall Street banks for a secondary share sale in oil giant Aramco, as it pushes ahead with one of the largest stock offerings in recent years, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度计划改进经济数据并进行新的人口普查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度政府正计划采取一系列措施来提高经济数据的质量，其中包括启动拖延已久的人口普查。【原文：India’s government is planning a number of steps to improve the quality of its economic data, including kicking off a long-delayed population census, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 散户投资者购买了 12 月以来最多的日本股票
item.description: 随着日经 225 指数创下历史新高，日本散户投资者上周买入了自 12 月以来最多的国内股票，而今年大部分时间他们都没有买入。【原文：Japan’s retail investors bought the most domestic stocks last week since December, after staying away for most of this year as the Nikkei 225 Stock Average reached an all-time high.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯称欧洲央行必须在夏休前两次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行必须在 8 月夏季休会前两次降低借贷成本，并在年底前再降低两次，而不能受美国联邦储备局的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank must lower borrowing costs twice before its August summer break and another two times before the end of the year, without being swayed by the US Federal Reserve, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 约翰-刘易斯恢复盈利，但员工无法获得奖金
item.description: 约翰-刘易斯合伙公司（John Lewis Partnership Plc）恢复盈利，但这家英国零售商的员工将在四年内第三次与奖金失之交臂。【原文：John Lewis Partnership Plc is back in profit but the staff that own the UK retailer will miss out on a bonus for the third time in four years.】

item.title: 中国外交部长王毅将访问新西兰并举行会谈
item.description: 中国外交部长王毅将于下周访问新西兰，讨论贸易和地区问题。【原文：China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi is set to travel to New Zealand next week to discuss trade and regional issues.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
澳大利亚西部各州洪灾将促进油菜籽作物生长
item.description: 西澳大利亚州是澳大利亚最大的谷物生产州，该州的大雨应能让农民种植更多的油菜籽，不过这种增加可能会以牺牲大麦和小麦等作物为代价。【原文：Heavy rains in Western Australia, the country’s top grain producing state, should allow farmers to plant more canola, although the increase could come at the expense of crops like barley and wheat.】

item.title: 香港、大湾区雇主对 2024 年的雇佣前景不甚乐观
item.description: 毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）的一项调查显示，由于奖金减少，香港和大湾区的雇主对今年的招聘不那么乐观，这凸显了金融中心所面临的困难。【原文：Hong Kong and Greater Bay Area employers became less optimistic on hiring this year as bonus payments sank, underscoring the difficulties faced by the financial hub, according to a KPMG survey.】

item.title: 迪拜帕金公司 4.29 亿美元首次公开募股获得 710 亿美元需求
item.description: Parkin Co.PJSC 公司在迪拜首次公开发行的 4.29 亿美元股票收到了 710 亿美元的订单，凸显了波斯湾地区对股票销售的持续强劲需求。【原文：Parkin Co. PJSC received $71 billion of orders for its $429 million Dubai initial public offering, underscoring the continued strong demand for share sales in the Persian Gulf.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: LGIM 的 Roe 为英国的债务问题提出了一个激进的解决方案：回购
item.description: 英国最大投资公司的一位基金经理提出了一个激进的想法，以弥补他所认为的国家财政中的重大缺陷。【原文：A fund manager at the UK’s biggest investment house has a radical idea to fix what he sees as a major flaw in the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 日本央行加息后，KKR 仍热衷于购买日本房地产
item.description: 即使日本央行自 2007 年以来首次加息，KKR & Co.也计划继续购买日本的房地产资产。【原文：KKR & Co. plans to keep buying real estate assets in Japan even if the central bank raises interest rates for the first time since 2007.】

item.title: 股市为何不在乎降息
item.description:
首先，我们相信他们终将到来。其次，在 S&P 500 指数中占主导地位的科技巨头的利润如此之高，以至于折扣几乎不重要

。【原文：

First, it’s convinced they’re coming eventually. Second, profits at the tech giants dominating the S&P 500 are so high that the discount barely matters

】

item.title: 监管越多股价越高
item.description:
东京证券交易所要求公司为股东创造更多价值— 而且这一要求正在发挥作用。【原文：

Tokyo’s stock exchange is demanding companies deliver more shareholder value — and it’s working.

】

item.title: 大宗商品被卷入全球波动性空头交易中
item.description: 交易商们正在押注原材料价格的波动，以对抗大宗商品行业历史上声名狼藉的繁荣与萧条。【原文：Traders are betting against volatility in raw materials prices, countering the commodity sector’s notoriously boom-and-bust history.】

item.title: 南非港口未能从红海转运中获益
item.description: 物流专家说，非洲的港口效率低下且老化严重，这阻碍了非洲大陆利用激增的船舶运输量的机会，而这一运输量可避免胡塞叛军通过红海发动袭击。【原文：Africa’s inefficient and aging ports are hampering the continent’s chances of capitalizing on a surge in ship traffic that’s avoiding attacks by Houthi rebels through the Red Sea, logistics experts said.】

item.title: 印度基金在市场低迷时买入创纪录数量的股票
item.description: 周三，印度金融机构利用该国中小型公司股票大幅下挫的机会，创下了单日购买当地股票的纪录。【原文：India’s financial institutions made record single-day purchases of local shares Wednesday, taking advantage of the sharp selloff in the nation’s small- and medium-sized companies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长仍对通过《澳大利亚央行改革法案》充满信心
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）周四表示，在继续与反对修改法案的立法者接触的同时，他有信心引导议会通过储备银行法案修正案。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers expressed confidence on Thursday that he will be able to guide amendments to the Reserve Bank Act through parliament as he continues to engage with lawmakers opposed to the changes.】

item.title: 中国医药股因创新药支持猜测而大涨
item.description: 据猜测，中国政府正在制定一项计划，支持开发世界领先的创新药物，中国医药股因此上涨。【原文：Chinese pharmaceutical stocks rose amid speculation that authorities are working on a plan to support the development of world-leading innovative drugs.】

item.title: 繁忙的二月，曼哈顿公寓租金攀升
item.description: 由于经济强劲和销售市场严峻，2 月份曼哈顿的公寓租金有所上涨。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents rose in February as a strong economy and tough sales market translated into a busy month for leasing.】

item.title: Taylors Wines（泰乐士酒业）表示在中国重建品牌需要付出艰苦努力
item.description: Taylors Wines 预计在中国重建品牌将面临挑战，但这家澳大利亚葡萄酒商已做好准备，一旦惩罚性关税结束，将在未来两三个月内重新进入中国市场。【原文：Taylors Wines foresees challenges in rebuilding its brand in China, but the Australian vintner is ready to re-enter the market over the next two to three months once punitive tariffs come to an end.】

item.title: 印度小盘股暴跌 800 亿美元，闪现警示信号
item.description: 小盘股的大幅回调预示着风险偏好正在削弱更广泛的印度市场，而印度市场在经历了多年的反弹之后，目前在亚太地区表现不佳。【原文：A sharp correction in small-cap stocks portends souring risk appetite on the broader Indian market, which is now an underperformer in Asia Pacific after a multi-year rally.】

item.title: 全球最大的国家养老金--日本 GPIF 准备解除外国股票借贷禁令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本政府养老金投资基金最早将于周五宣布恢复借出外国股票，这是在该基金出人意料地决定停止借出外国股票四年之后。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund will announce as early as Friday that it will resume lending foreign stocks, according to people familiar with the matter, four years after its surprise decision to stop the practice.】

item.title: 韩国私立教育支出再创新高
item.description: 韩国人在私立教育上的支出再创新高，部分原因是对医学院录取的狂热，这进一步加剧了家庭经济的紧张，而家庭经济紧张本已是韩国低生育率的一个关键因素。【原文：South Koreans’ spending on private education hit another record high, driven partly by a frenzy for medical school admission, further straining household finances that are already a key factor behind the nation’s low fertility rate.】

item.title: 日本自民党官员称日本央行加息风险增加财政改革需求
item.description: 执政党自民党的一位资深议员表示，由于日本央行可能最快于下周加息，政府需要整顿财政，以降低金融风险。【原文：With the Bank of Japan likely to hike interest rates as soon as next week, the government needs to gets its fiscal house in order to mitigate financial risks, a senior lawmaker in the ruling Liberal Democratic Party said.】

item.title: 全球市场趋紧，铜价向每吨 9,000 美元迈进
item.description: 由于投资者押注全球市场供应趋紧，铜价涨幅扩大至每吨 9,000 美元，达到 11 个月以来的最高点。【原文：Copper extended gains toward $9,000 a ton, reaching its highest in 11 months, as investors bet on supplies tightening in the global market.】

item.title: 对日元今年反弹的殷切期望让位于微弱涨幅的讨论
item.description: 对日元今年表现优于同类货币的预期几乎消失殆尽，策略师们现在预测日元在2024年年底的表现将在其起点的几个百分点之内。【原文：Expectations for the yen to outperform its peers this year have all but evaporated, with strategists now forecasting the currency to end 2024 within a few percent of where it started.】
